title.native: 怪盗クイーンはサーカスがお好き
title.romaji: Kaitou Queen wa Circus ga Osuki

description:
They always steal the prey they aim for. That is Phantom Thief Queen. Gender, age, nationality unknown. Together with their partner Joker, RD, they travel around the world on the airship Troubadour. This time, the Queen is aiming for a cursed jewel, the legendary Rose of Linden. A hypnotist, an acrobat, a magician...the talented circus members challenge the Queen! What is their purpose? In order to get back the jewel, the Queen stands up to the challenge in a bold and brilliant way (or disguise). Nothing is impossible for the Queen!

(Source: HIDIVE)

title.native: 名探偵夢水清志郎事件ノート
怪盗クイーンの優雅な休暇（バカンス）

node.description: Originally an elementary school teacher, he began writing novels as he searched for books to entertain children.

__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

__[Profile (Miracle Bus Corp.)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/moehyuga)__

__Introduction:__
Moe Hyuuga is a Japanese composer and arranger, who is affiiliated with the Miracle Bus Corporation. 

__Biography:__
She started learning the piano as early as the age of two. Moe also aspired to be a composer, while being able to play music at an early age. In her current state of affairs, she mainly composes and arranges visual type music such as commercials, dramas and animation.
Tetsuji Hayashi is a Japanese composer, orchestrator and singer-songwriter

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/81658029) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/akimitsuhomma/) | [Website](https://akimitsuhomma.com/)

He was part of the music group [Vink](https://anilist.co/staff/228057/).

**[Profile (archived)](http://web.archive.org/web/20101006180516/http://www.g-tac.co.jp/company/intabyu/toyama1.html)**

**Toyama Sou (外山草)** is a Japanese director, series composer, episode director and storyboard artist.
